<title level="1" right="Trait">[Lizardfolk](/Traits.aspx?ID=760)</title>

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 317 <sup>1.1</sup>

A creature with this trait is a member of the [lizardfolk](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=81) ancestry, a family of reptilian humanoids. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by lizardfolk.
